con:soapui-project.name: NHINCReceivingXDRAsyncResponseTests
con:soapui-project.con:description:
This suite tests the inbound DS deferred response service. This suite is standard mode only as there are tests for policy and auditing.
Set the GatewayPropsDir property to the config/nhin of the gateway under test.

con:testSuite.name: NHINCReceivingXDRAsyncResponseTestSuite
con:testSuite.con:description: This test needs to be run with DS Deferred Response Outbound set to passthrough, and the inbound set to standard. This is because the test is designed to hit the mock step on the inbound side.
